result.eng: I have neither a brother nor a sister.
result.html: Níl deartháir ná deirfiúr agamI have neither a brother nor a sister.
result.ponchtml: Níl dearṫáir ná deirfiúr agamI have neither a brother nor a sister.

result.eng: I drink neither wine nor whiskey.
result.html: Ní ólaim fíon ná fuisceI drink neither wine nor whiskey.
result.ponchtml: Ní ólaim fíon ná fuisceI drink neither wine nor whiskey.

result.eng: He had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ga: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.orig: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.html: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ bríste nó a ḋaṫ san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
